item.title: What do you think the real "you" is?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Itheblaze)
item.dc:creator: Itheblaze
item.content:encoded: All Intellectuals feel free to express please. Are you just a bunch of Atoms chasing Eves? How are you different than a complex computer? Do you think you were made by someone of a higher intelligence, or a bunch of Apes got struck by a bolt of lighting and their hair fell off. Do you think the real "You" dies when this turtle shell body dies?

item.title: Internet Telepathy - Does it exist?
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheCigSmokinMan3)
item.dc:creator: TheCigSmokinMan3
item.content:encoded:
People have talked about phone telepathy... The ability to know the phone call is for you... Or you know who is calling you...

But Internet Telepathy? Can you read someones mind from instant messaging on the web, webboards or email?

If the universe is energy and information (as according my interpretation of String Theory) are these 'messages' thought projection transmitted by electrical signals or impluses...

Is possible to start to read someone's mind you correspond with over the...

Internet Telepathy - Does it exist?

item.title: Very unusual experience - leaving mechanics puzzled
item.author: invalid@example.com (Teretere)
item.dc:creator: Teretere
item.content:encoded:
This is a true account, I didn’t see little green men, or anything like that, I don’t believe I have any special abilities , overly endowed with genial capability or on any spectrum. A couple of weeks ago I was working a late shift and went to get into my car, it is a later model CX5 Mazda, when I attempted get into the car the inside light was flashing , when I got into the car and tried to start it the dials ridiculously were whirling indicating I was doing 200 km/ hrs and the overhead...

Very unusual experience - leaving mechanics puzzled

item.title: Weird drive-by
item.author: invalid@example.com (Enna)
item.dc:creator: Enna
item.content:encoded:
Earlier in the day I was binge watching everything I could ( was really drawn to topic) on Parallel Universe…Later on same day, I was driving & next to me on highway was the image I took pic of. How ironic, huh!

Hard to drive & take pic on cell but I couldn’t see all it said on back. Something about we are totally unprepared & it’s real. Web addy I swore I saw but after closer review of pic when parked, I could not make it out. Grrrrrr

item.title: Tell us about your unexplained/paranormal/extraordinary experiences!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sagittarius)
item.dc:creator: Sagittarius
item.content:encoded:
Almost everyone has that one time when something happened to them and they are unable to explain how or why that particular event occurred even to this day.

Since most members of this forum seem to love discussing paranormal and mysterious topics, I thought it would be a good idea to make a thread in which everyone can share their craziest, strangest or creepiestexperiences.

Apart from sharing your story, you can also give explanations to other’s experiences if you feel qualified to...

Tell us about your unexplained/paranormal/extraordinary experiences!

item.title: Ghost Spotted in Salem
item.author: invalid@example.com (PaulaJedi)
item.dc:creator: PaulaJedi
item.content:encoded:
The mayor of Salem took a photo of an outdoor lamp post and there appears to be a face inside the lamp. Is this a ghost sighting or just coincidence?

‘Ghost’ spotted in Salem, home of Salem witch trials

item.title: Ghostly Figure in Doorway on British TV Show
item.author: invalid@example.com (PaulaJedi)
item.dc:creator: PaulaJedi
item.content:encoded:
A ghostly figure appeared in a doorway on the British show "Most Haunted" and you can see the video here:

Most Haunted cameras spy a 'ghost' roaming in corridor | Daily Mail Online

Was it real or a hoax? It looks like a big man walking up or down stairs and is somewhat transparent.
This was in a 17th century mansion. Thoughts?

item.content:encoded:
Cosmo posted a new blog entry

British Bigfoot?



A mother walking her dogs in a forest thought to be haunted was stunned when her pets suddenly stopped to stare at a 'creature' that some are claiming is Bigfoot.

Maxine Caulfield was strolling through an area known as Slieveanorra in County Antrim, Northern Ireland, when she claims her...​

British Bigfoot?

item.title: Introduction to state of the art Electronic Voice Phenomenon (EVP)
item.author: invalid@example.com (AWD)
item.dc:creator: AWD
item.content:encoded:
An introduction to state of the art Electronic Voice Phenomenon (EVP).

I first started seeing this show up in the early 1970s as a crude method using a simple tape recorder via playback of low level background sounds of localized ghost phenomena.

By a combination of trial and error and some with better understanding of both the phenomena at hand and of electronics, the technology has gotten Much, Much better.

Much experimental work can still be done in this area of research.

I look at...

Introduction to state of the art Electronic Voice Phenomenon (EVP)
